message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,000. It's a valuable item that I believe is worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but I'm still hoping for a little more than $10,000. How about $10,500? It's a fair price considering the value of the product. Let's meet in the middle.
Thank you for your response, Alice. I'm willing to consider $10,500 as a counteroffer. I hope this meets in the middle of our prices.
